column1: Kata Robata////I've been here many times because I work nearby. Lunch and dinner is great.  The service could be slow because of the high capacity diners at peak times.  I enjoy the sashimi bento for lunch.  The quality and portion is better than any other near by Japanese restaurants. Other than that
column3: especially the miso cod or kakuni.  They both melt in your mouth.  To me the sashimi and the rolls are okay.  They can improve on that part.  I feel like Kata Robata is more of a modernized Japanese cuisine.
